channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 03:28 Repulse of alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Marganets and Marganets territorial community- Myrivska territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community- Pokrovska territorial community- Chervonogrigorivska territorial community
item.description: 🟡 03:28 Repulse of alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Marganets and Marganets territorial community- Myrivska territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community- Pokrovska territorial community- Chervonogrigorivska territorial community#Днипропетровская_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
